@description.name: @description
@description.body: A form widget which allows multiple selection with a drop down checked list.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: atom {qx.ui.basic.Atom} shows the text and icon of the content
@childControl.description: shows the text and icon of the content

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: arrow {qx.ui.basic.Image} shows the arrow to open the popup
@childControl.description: shows the arrow to open the popup

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event for psuedo property selection

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event for psuedo property checked

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event for psuedo property value

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event for psuedo property modelSelection

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when a tag widget is added to the results; data is a map containing: tagWidget - the tag widget being added item - the item in the list that is checked itemModel - the model item that backs the item

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when a tag widget is removed from the results; data is a map containing: tagWidget - the tag widget being added item - the item in the list that is checked itemModel - the model item that backs the item

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {qx.ui.basic.Atom[]} atoms used to show the selection

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Getter for psuedo property "checked"

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Setter for psuedo property "checked"

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Reset for psuedo property "checked"

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for changes to the modelSelection array

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for the All/None button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for changes to the list's checked array

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Listener method for "pointerover" event

  • Adds state "hovered"
  • Removes "abandoned" and adds "pressed" state (if "abandoned" state is set)

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Listener method for "pointerout" event

  • Removes "hovered" state
  • Adds "abandoned" and removes "pressed" state (if "pressed" state is set)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Toggles the popup's visibility.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the enabled state of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current set enabled state.
